Package com.vector.cfg.automation.scripting.api

AutomationInterface scripting API for client side scripts for Groovy code.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IScriptCreationApi
    IScriptCreationApi is the main interface to create new IScriptTasks inside of an IScript.
    IScriptCreationApi.IApplicationScriptTaskBuilder
    The IScriptCreationApi.IProjectScriptTaskBuilder provides the methods callable during creation of an IScriptTask with IScriptTaskType is an application type.
    IScriptCreationApi.IProjectScriptTaskBuilder
    The IScriptCreationApi.IProjectScriptTaskBuilder provides the methods callable during creation of an IScriptTask with IScriptTaskType is bound to a project.
    IScriptCreationApi.IScriptExecutionContextWithNotExecutableReasons
    The Interface IScriptExecutionContextWithNotExecutableReasons combines IScriptExecutionContext and INotExecutableReasonBuilder.INotExecutableReasonBuilderProvider.
    IScriptCreationApi.IScriptTaskBuilder
    The IScriptCreationApi.IScriptTaskBuilder provides the methods callable during creation of an IScriptTask.
    IScriptFactory
    The IScriptFactory interface provides the entry point that Java code could provide script tasks.
    IScriptTaskUserDefinedArgument<T>
    IScriptTaskUserDefinedArgument defines an script user defined argument create during IScriptTask by an IScriptCreationApi.IScriptTaskBuilder.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ScriptClientExecutionException
    The script task can throw an ScriptClientExecutionException to abort the execution of an IScriptTask, and display a meaningful message to the user.
    ScriptExecutionException
    ScriptExecutionException is the standard type thrown by an IScriptTask execution.

Package com.vector.cfg.automation.scripting.api Description

AutomationInterface scripting API for client side scripts for Groovy code.
